EasyQuest.Name: Dream Eater 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return ItemsManager.GetItemCountById(8049) >= 1 || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(2459) || Quest.IsObjectiveComplete(1, 2459);

EasyQuest.Name: Fly to Darnassus
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Moonglade";

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Darkshore
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Azeroth && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport;

EasyQuest.Name: Catch Ship Stormwind
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId == (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor && !ObjectManager.Me.InTransport;

EasyQuest.Name: In Defense of the King's Lands
Spells Level 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return !Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Aldrassil") && !Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Shadowglen") || !wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1126) || !wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(6673) || !wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1243) || !wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1494) || !wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1784);

EasyQuest.Name: Spells Level 4
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return !Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Aldrassil") && !Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Shadowglen") || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(8921) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(774) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(100) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(772) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2052) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(589) ||wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(13163) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1978) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(53) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(921);

EasyQuest.Name: Spells Level 6
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName != "Teldrassil" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(467) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5177) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(6343) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(34428) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(17) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(591) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(3044) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1130) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1776) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1757);

EasyQuest.Name: Spells Level 8
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName != "Teldrassil" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(339) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5186) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1715) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(284) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(586) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(139) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5116) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(14260) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5277) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(6760);

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Dolanaar
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Dolanaar" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(483) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(7383);

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Dolanaar" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(483) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(7383) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Dolanaar");

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Dolanaar" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(483) &&Quest.GetQuestCompleted(7383) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Dolanaar");

EasyQuest.Name: Spells Level 10
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName != "Teldrassil" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(99) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5232) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(8924) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(16689) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1058) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2687) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(6546) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2053) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(8092) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2006) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(594) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(13165) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(13549) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(19883) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(6770) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5171) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2983);

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Loch Modan
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Stoutlager Inn" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(416) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(418);

EasyQuest.Name: Hearthstone Auberdine
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") == "Auberdine" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1001) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(955);

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 3
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Stoutlager Inn" || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(416) && Quest.GetQuestCompleted(418) || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Thelsamar");

EasyQuest.Name: Use Hearthstone 4
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Lua.LuaDoString<bool>("if GetItemCooldown(6948) > 0 then return true else return false end") || Lua.LuaDoString<string>("bindlocation = GetBindLocation(); return bindlocation;") != "Auberdine" || Usefuls.SubMapZoneName.Contains("Auberdine") || Usefuls.ContinentId != (int) ContinentId.Kalimdor;

EasyQuest.Name: Tram to IF
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Quest.GetQuestCompleted(1338) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "City of Ironforge" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Loch Modan" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Dun Morogh" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Wetlands";

EasyQuest.Name: Spider Ichor, Bear Meat, Boar Intestines
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Boar Intestines") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Bear Meat") && !wManager.wManagerSetting.CurrentSetting.DoNotSellList.Contains("Spider Ichor");

EasyQuest.Name: Learn Spells Level 12
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Usefuls.ContinentId != (int) ContinentId.Azeroth || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(19834) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(53408) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5242) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(7384) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(72) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(588) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1244) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(592) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2589) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1766) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(604) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(145) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(130) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(597) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1108) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(755) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(705) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(14281) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(20736) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(136) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2974) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(2008) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(1535) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(547) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(370) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(5229) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.SpellManager.KnowSpell(8936);

EasyQuest.Name: Teleport to Moonglade
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Moonglade" || Quest.HasQuest(5931) || Quest.GetQuestCompleted(5931) || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Druid;

EasyQuest.Name: Portal to Darnassus 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Quest.GetQuestCompleted(5931) && Quest.HasQuest(5931) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Darnassus" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Teldrassil" || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Druid;

EasyQuest.Name: Portal from Darnassus 1
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return !Quest.HasQuest(6001) || Quest.IsObjectiveComplete(1, 6001) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName != "Darnassus" && wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName != "Teldrassil" || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Druid;

EasyQuest.Name: Portal to Darnassus 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return Quest.GetQuestCompleted(6001) || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Darnassus" || wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName == "Teldrassil" || ObjectManager.Me.WowClass != WoWClass.Druid;

EasyQuest.Name: Portal from Darnassus 2
EasyQuest.IsCompleteCondition: return wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName != "Darnassus" && wManager.Wow.Helpers.Usefuls.MapZoneName != "Teldrassil";
